title: Mystery Champion not in store
body: Is Mystery Champion not available on store anymore?

replies.body:
"mystery champion shards" used to be the thing we could get, which we can't get anymore because they wouldn't be worth it, and you can't reroll champions anyway.

There is a mystery champion option, but it's only for people who DON'T own 10 champions or more.
strange, i can still buy mystery champion for 3900 BE or whatever it costs.
Well I can't but the day before I wrote the post I bought 2 or 3 and now the option is gone.
it was part of the blue essence emporium so it won't be back until some time next year it looks like
